org.springframework.mock.web.portlet

Class ServletWrappingPortletContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.mock.web.portlet.ServletWrappingPortletContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PortletContext

    public class ServletWrappingPortletContext
extends java.lang.Object
implements PortletContext
    Mock implementation of the PortletContext interface, wrapping an underlying ServletContext.
    Since:
    3.0
    Author:
    Juergen Hoeller
    See Also:
    MockPortletContext
